title: Snap Tanda-2 Jawi @ Win Jawiware
content:
[Gembira dengan Morabira](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317234425/http:/typophile.com/node/122189) , this contest has been launched exclusively for the the Malay World (Indonesia, Malaysia, Brunei @ Singapore).  
 [Snap Jawi Singboard @ Win Jawiware](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317234425/http:/vectorise.net/forums/threads/5734-Fly-High-Jawi-n-Khat-%286%29-Snap-Signboards-Win-Perisian-Jawi)  
 [Snap Tanda-2 Jawi @ Menang Perisian Jawi](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317234425/http:/www.emenang.com/community/index.php?/topic/55052-fly-high-jawi-khat-snap-tanda-2-menang-jawiware/)  
 [Photo Challenge | Signboard Jawi](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317234425/http:/www.fotomedia.com.my/forum/showthread.php?t=22552)  
Happy Hunting

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317234425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/See%20Jawi%20Kan_6609.jpg)
author: AzizMostafa

comments.content:
Is this contest is exclusively for the sign boards. And only listed countries can take part in the contest. Can any other country participate in the sontest.

- [progressive jackpots](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317234425/http:/www.pokiesslotmachines.com.au/games.php)

\> Is this contest is exclusively for the sign boards.  
@ Yes! Provided that they carry the Jawi script (Tulisan Jawi) @ still standing - not removed or replaced.

\> Can any other country participate in the contest.  
@ Only citizens of the 4-mentioned countries can participate by posting not smaller than 640x450 fotos captured by their own lenses and provided that they have not published them elsewhere.

-

Yeah is there any way that other countries and cities also can take part into it?? [Jacket from Batman Beyond at hexder.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317234425/http:/www.hexder.com/products/Batman-Beyond-Jacket-Terry-McGinnis.html)

[Putera Mmizai!](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317234425/http:/www.emenang.com/community/index.php?/user/43326-putera-mizai/) is the winner.  
Congrats @ Thank you Mohamad Hilmi for [flying High Jawi](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317234425/http:/puteramizai.blogspot.com/search/label/Semarak%20Jawi)
This is an very informative website. Must visit this site . [Online Electronic Store](http://web.archive.org/www.shopmaxdeals.com).
